room_title: Escape room "The Cruise Ship" by Locked In Stuart in West Palm Beach
review: Escaped the cruise room. Had 8 people. May have been a few too many when we realized the clues were sequential. Had a great time though. Would prefer if the staff did not come in the room to give clues. Over the intercom much more preferred!

room_title: Escape room "The Cruise Ship" by Locked In Stuart in West Palm Beach
review: Had a great time. Did the CRUISE room. One of the things you need to do is very finicky. Won't give it away but we were doing for easily 5 min before employee came in and did something to get us next clue. They probably need to adjust it. All I'll say is you need a steady hand!

room_title: Escape room "The Cruise Ship" by Locked In Stuart in West Palm Beach
review: Cruise room was great. Only one room though. But still fun!!
